price: Kamar wancãn *(asĩrin) Allah, Mabuwayi, Mai hikima, ke yin wahayi zuwa gare ka da zuwa ga waɗanda ke gabãninka.
arabic: كَذَٰلِكَ يُوحِيٓ إِلَيۡكَ وَإِلَى ٱلَّذِينَ مِن قَبۡلِكَ ٱللَّهُ ٱلۡعَزِيزُ ٱلۡحَكِيمُ
footnotes: * Asirin haɗa jama'a bã zã su rarrabu ba. Watau su riƙi Allah Shi kaɗai ne Ubangiji Mai yin umurni ko hani, kuma su riƙi cewa Muhammadu, tsĩra da aminci su tabbata a gareshi, shĩ ne cikamakin Annabãwa, bãyansa bã a bai wa kõwa kõme fãce fahimta ga abin da ya zo da shi.

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: kadhālika yūḥī ilayka wa-ilā alladhīna min qablika al-lahu al-ʿazīzu al-ḥakīmu
